summary: Reliable and dependable professional with strong customer service, sales, and leadership experience. Demonstrates active listening, excellent organizational skills, and the ability to multi-task in fast-paced environments. Seeking a stable career in a customer-facing role.

experience.title: Membership Coordinator
experience.description: Responsible for selling memberships at the health club. Generate at least 60% of own prospects through normal prospecting channels; the remaining 40% from club advertising and promotions. Build strong working relationships with club staff. Perform paperwork and administrative follow-up on personal sales, including follow-up on new memberships. Time distribution includes telephone solicitation, mailings, touring prospects and sales presentations, follow-up on new members and referrals, paperwork, and attendance at meetings and training.

experience.title: Customer service Manager on dutie (MOD)
experience.description: Customer service MOD at a privately owned sports and fitness club. Duties included customer service, opening/closing procedures, monetary responsibilities, facility opening/closing checklist, outbound calls, EFT collections and updates, confirming and cancelling memberships and registrations, entering guest waivers, filing, faxing, mailing invoices, answering high-volume calls, greeting and checking in guests, cash handling, facility safety and cleanliness up to company standards.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative/Bar Attendant
experience.description: Facilitated excellent customer service to produce sales; duties included sales, cash handling, opening/closing procedures, monetary responsibilities, fast-paced environment, mixing drinks, preparing food, and ordering supplies from vendors.

experience.title: Sales/Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Facilitated excellent customer service to produce sales; duties included answering and directing phone lines, greeting and assisting guests, merchandise layout, freight unloading, monetary responsibilities, closing procedures, ordering for customers, and balloon bouquet design.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: Worked in a nationwide call center to broker and secure sales of medical supplies; duties included customer service, outbound call sales, invoicing confirmations and cancellations, filing, faxing, and mailing invoices to clients.

experience.title: Merchandise and Customer Assistant (MCA)
experience.description: Sales-focused role in nationwide call center environment; duties included customer service, outbound call sales, invoicing confirmations and cancellations, filing, faxing, and mailing invoices; handling high volume inquiries.
